revised_title: New Species of Illicium Linnaei: A Starry Aniseed Tree Discovered in West Florida
tldr: The author describes a new species of Illicium Linnaei, or Starry Aniseed Tree, discovered in West Florida. The tree has unique characteristics and medicinal properties, and its cultivation and potential uses are discussed. The author also compares it to the oriental Illicium and provides detailed botanical descriptions and illustrations.
